info.name: fo_112_verify_to_receive_a_cash_in_tnx_via_static_qr
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to receive a cash_in tnx via static QR

###### Testcase:

1. Login owner account
    
2. Get data
    
    1. account coa / get list account
        
    2. account bank / get list bank account => get MB account
        
    3. account bank / get list mb alias =>get random 1 MB alias to receive hook
        
    4. posting / Get list posting => get total posting
        
    5. payment / get list payment => get total
        
    6. home-report / cash flow => get data
        
    7. home-report / account receivable unpaid => get data (only account_receivable)
        
    8. home-report / account receivable customer => get data (only account_receivable)
        
    9. home-report / account life time => get data
        
    10. home-report / cash-flow period => get data
        
    11. home-report / profit loss period => get data (income & expense)
        
    12. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
        
3. Hook cash_in via MB alias
    
4. Check data
    
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => increase 1 & data matching
        
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
        
    3. Payment / Get list payment => nothing happen
        
    4. account bank / get list mb alias => find respective mb alias & check total_balance_amount
        
    5. account bank / get list bank account => find & check MB account
        
    6. posting / get list posting => have respective posting(s)
        

###### Note:

- Tạm thời chỉ check ghi nhận posting, phần check report sẽ handle sau
